data.title: Michael Gray (DJ) - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Michael Gray (DJ): his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

DJ and music producer who is known for being one-half of the remixing duo Full Intention. In 2005, his debut single "The Weekend" peaked at #7 on the UK Singles chart, and was used in other various media, including a Honda commercial.

Before Fame

His debut single "The Weekend" led to a meteoric rise in his popularity after its release in 2004. He released the single under his own name.

Trivia

In July 2006, he released his second single, "Borderline." It peaked at #12 on the UK Singles chart. As a member of Full Intention, he began remixing songs in 1994. The duo's 1995 remix of the 1979 song "I Love America," originally by Patrick Juvet, reached #1 on the US Dance chart.

Family Life

He was born and raised in the United Kingdom.

Associated With
